explorer.title: Explorer mode
explorer.do-your-best-and-earn-medals: Do your best, play the map in single player mode and earn medals.
explorer.missing-a-country-more-will-be-: Missing a country? More countries will be added continuously!
explorer.pick-a-country-to-play: Pick a country to play from the map or the list below.
explorer.track-your-progess: Track your overall progress here. Can you cover the world in gold?
